<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Kobold Scout](/Monsters.aspx?ID=273)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Most kobolds encountered outside of a well-defended warren or lair are kobold scouts, creatures trained for stalking and the hunt.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Kobold_KoboldScout.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Kobold Scout](/Monsters.aspx?ID=273)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=224" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 213</row>

**Perception** +8; darkvision

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +3, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67) (20 bolts)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +5 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 16

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortsword +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d6 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
crossbow +9 ([range increment 120 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d8 piercing

**Hurried Retreat** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The kobold scout is adjacent to at least one enemy. **Effect** The kobold scout Strides up to its Speed plus 5 feet and gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against reactions triggered by this movement. It must end this movement in a space that's not adjacent to any enemy. 

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The kobold scout deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

</column>
